column4: Hi, I am using Natty. I find that even when I am connected to the internet, my me menu status set to available, still there is no textbox in the me menu to post. What is the issue?
did you add a twitter account to gwibber¿¿
i think gwibber now uses lens, not sure lgp171188
Yes. I have twitter, facebook and identi.ca accounts added. In fact I get notifications for all those accounts
